message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! I appreciate you being willing to sell it to me.  While $90 is a good starting point, I'm looking to spend a bit less.  Would you be willing to go down to $75?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I understand you're looking to spend a bit less, but I'm not comfortable going down to $75. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $82.50. It's a fair price considering the value of the product, and I think you'll really enjoy it.
